title: The validity of hypnosis as treatment for psyâ€¦

content.question: The validity of hypnosis as a treatment for psychiatric disorders is most directly threatened by

choices.label: the disagreement between psychologists and psychiatrists about which disorders it should be used for
the perception that it is rooted in biological science rather than in psychological science
the lack of empirical support for its efficacy
the generally negative bias regarding its use

content.answer: the lack of empirical support for its efficacy

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
